```{r setup, include=FALSE}
  echo = TRUE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",

)

require(rmarkdown)
require(knitr)

```

# Load the `useeior` package
```{r loadpackage}
devtools::load_all()
```
# Compare models
```{r compare}
for (modelname_pair in params$modelname_pair) {
  rmarkdown::render("inst/doc/CompareModels.Rmd",
                    output_file = paste0("Compare", modelname_pair[1], "&", modelname_pair[2], ".html"))
}
```
